com.magnet.http.jetty

Class JettyService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.magnet.discovery.spi.common.AbstractNamespaceProvider
      • com.magnet.web.core.spi.impl.AbstractWebContainer
        • com.magnet.http.jetty.JettyService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PostConstruct, PreDestroy, RequiredService, com.magnet.discovery.spi.NamespaceProvider, JettyStatisticsMXBean, MagnetMBean, PlatformProvider, WebContainer, WebContainerStatisticsMXBean

    @ConfiguredBy(value=JettyConfigBean.class,
              defaultConfig=JettyService.DefaultConfigBean.class,
              validator=JettyService.DefaultConfigValidator.class)
@NamedAlias(value="jetty")
public class JettyService
extends com.magnet.web.core.spi.impl.AbstractWebContainer
implements PostConstruct, PreDestroy, JettyStatisticsMXBean
    Service that is responsible for starting the Jetty container.
